動物用藥品名稱: 雅碧雞傳染性喉頭氣管炎活毒疫苗
地址: 3 HAMELACHA ST. ( P.O.B 489), WEST INDUSTRIAL ZONE, BEIT-SHEMESH 99100, ISRAEL
效能(適應症): 預防雞傳染性喉頭氣管炎。
成分: A LYOPHILIZED FORM OF THE VIRUS. THE VACCINE IS PREPAREDFROM A MILD STRAIN OF INFECTIOUS LARYNGOTRACHEITIS VIRUS(SAMBERG STRAIN)(ILT) ≧10^3.5 EID50.THE VIRUS IS GROWN IN FERTILE S.P.F. EGGS.
